description: This file declares external functions for creating ASN.1 objects related to CRL (Certificate Revocation List) handling, such as CRL, TBSCertList, RevokedCertificate, RevokedCertificates, Signature, and CertificateList. It serves as an API header for ASN.1 encoding/decoding in a cryptographic or certificate management context.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CreateCRL
methods.description: Creates an ASN.1 CRL object, representing a Certificate Revocation List.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CreateTBSCertList
methods.description: Creates an ASN.1 TBSCertList object, representing the 'To Be Signed' part of a CRL.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CreateRevokedCertificate
methods.description: Creates an ASN.1 RevokedCertificate object, representing a revoked certificate entry.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CreateRevokedCertificates
methods.description: Creates an ASN.1 RevokedCertificates object, a sequence of revoked certificate entries.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CreateSignature
methods.description: Creates an ASN.1 Signature object, represented as a BitString.

methods.name: AnscAsn1CreateCertificateList
methods.description: Creates an ASN.1 CertificateList object, which is the same as CRL.
